alert.note: Alert for Billings; Dunn; Golden Valley; McLean; Mercer; Sheridan (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 25 at 6:57PM CDT until October 26 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT /MIDNIGHT MDT/ THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM CDT /MIDNIGHT MDT/ THURSDAY TO 6 AM CDT /5 AM MDT/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow of an additional 5 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of western and central North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 AM CDT /midnight MDT/ Thursday. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 1 AM CDT /midnight MDT/ Thursday to 6 AM CDT /5 AM MDT/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Billings; Dunn; Golden Valley; McLean; Mercer; Sheridan
